data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Gabú, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gabú, Guinea-Bissau
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Gabú, Guinea-Bissau.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Gabú. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Gabú, Guinea-Bissau, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Bambara people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 4,011 believers in Gabú, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Gabú, Guinea-Bissau.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 4,011 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Gabú
location.people_groups_list: Mankanya, Deaf, Balanta, Kentohe, Nalu, Arab, Syrian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mankanya (56,000), Deaf (20,000), Balanta, Kentohe (392,000), Nalu (11,000), Arab, Syrian (1,500)
